name: kabbage
text: I dunno it just seems like Ray's spinning Achilles-punch in frame five is pretty much the best thing ever. I mean with the gut and the thong and all it jus... I mean whoa.

name: aaron_haynes
text:
I think panel four suggests much more fluid motion. Onstad seems to have a little trouble with odd perspectives (especially since he uses only one line width, even for contours and motion). It's obviously flawed, but I like to see him trying new stuff like this.

I'm pretty sure you were just saying it was cool, though, which it is.

name: vheissu
text: You are probably right but all I can think of when I see his legs like that is 'damn, his legs look exactly like his arms do when he is walking.'

name: weretrout
text: You need more chubbies. I'm proud that I was your first.

name: vheissu
text: Face palm . It is because he is a cat that his "legs" and "arms" look so similar.

name: kochipoik
text: I wish I could chubby this more than once

name: saint
text: and the hiss dismount takes the cake.

name: redphillip
text: Abso-lutely!

name: nerd_specs
text: This is pretty much the only instance Ray ever acts like a real cat.

name: lolsworth
text: There was also that time he was all "What the hell don't pick me up" way back when

name: rmj12345
text: There was the matter of whether or not he's neutered.

name: gormster
text: His arm seems to be coming out of his belly.

name: abendsonnen
text: I was looking at that too. Rather unsettling.

name: jdhenry105
text: This is the first strip in a long time where I remembered that Ray is actually a cat.

name: huber
text: but what a cat!

name: delzhand
text: A comment left by delzhand was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Unfun, kledermans, stoned_lightning)

name: malesherbez
text: it gets sort of tucked in I think

name: atmus
text: He tucks it in and around the front to make his junk look hella big.  That's what I would do if I were  thong wearing bipedle cat.

name: lexsenthur
text: I see you've given this some thought.

name: re5urgam
text: I enjoy your avatar-comment synergy.

name: stuart
text: panel 3?

name: daidai
text: Oh man, when I saw your avatar I thought for a second that poing had made a relevant comment.

name: anomalous3
text: Ray's always been capable of moves your average cat can only dream about. Even with the almost-diabetes

name: baryonyx
text: Diabetes, you see, was not invited to the Great Outdoor Fight.

name: wulvaine
text:
Diabetes was actually killed in the 2005 Fight.

At least, according to the GOF wiki-place.

name: nurdbot
text: The last panel with the hat. Awesome. Ray and Pat should have some sort of old fashioned hat off!

name: zeal
text: Big D's been around less and less since Ray kicked it out of his pizza party.  Feels stone cold rejected.

name: whuppins
text: It's all about panel 6.

name: imbeta
text: HISSSSS!

name: littlefatdog
text: note how he grabs hold of Ron's sweatpants in order to swing himself around

name: philosophe
text: Hmmm. I think they're jeans. Check panels 3 and 8.

name: shatneresque
text: You're both right!

name: deancain29
text: H E L L U V A move

name: heavymetaljesus
text: The crane perfected this strip.

name: jackparsons
text: It's like The Scoops in "Soylent Green". Roses are red, violets are blue, fighters that lose are made into glue.

name: mygoodfriend
text: The hiss is amazing. Makes it look to the troops like he just stung him with the Buddhist Palm or something.

name: soticoto
text: I'm gonna hafta watch Kung Fu Hustle again tonight JUST for that.

name: luckypyjamas
text: sheesh!

name: windfish
text: I thought I was a BAMF because I walked on the grass.  Then I read this comic.

name: dusty
text: I think Moore's law applies to Achwood, except in awesomeness rather than speed. And it started out good.

name: drago25
text:
That is some gut-swingin' bona fide badass right there
At least Ron may not have to deal with bad wife too much anymore

name: direhaggis
text: Considering the second to last panel, I wonder if they just throw a few bulldozers in near the main entrance after a few hours. I'd just let the dead or dying rise up into a huge, bloody heap, like a giant broken finger pointing to the heavens as if to say 'you all try to top this.'

name: stevepants
text: HISSSSSS

name: ctaronno
text: Oh shit, right, Ray's a cat.

name: deusoma
text: I hate to say it, but when I saw panels 4 and 5, my immediate reaction was "Wow, Ray's activities are so poorly conveyed."

name: taskmaster
text: Interestingly enough Shaolin KungFu has a movement very similar to what Ray just did

name: aristagoras
text: Much love to Onstad. However, the second row of panels is one of the worst things in Achewood.
